High-level horse section and responsible ownership angle
Primary focus of price guide section

top_3_missing_elements: Educational content - all competitors are transactional marketplaces
Price transparency - only 1 of 10 shows any pricing
Buyer guidance - no step-by-step buying process anywhere
pferdewert_advantages: Can provide comprehensive educational content (not just listings)
AI evaluation tool is unique in market
Can build trust through expertise demonstration
No conflict of interest (not selling horses directly)
